strings.string: [B]General options used by XBMC File Cleaner[/B]
[B]Conditions that must be met before any files are deleted[/B]
Only delete a video after a certain number of days after watching
Days after which a video is considerd to have expired
Only delete a video when it has a low rating
Delete a video when its rating is lower than
[I]Note that music videos do not have ratings and ignore these settings [/I]
Only delete videos if low on disk space
Minimum percentage of free disk space
Path to check for free disk space
Move videos to a holding folder instead
[I]Note that files in this holding folder will never be deleted automatically [/I]
Error accessing video library database. Please check your logs.
Cannot move file %s as it doesn't exist
Hard disk capacity is 0. Did you select the correct hard disk to check for free space?
No path selected to check for disk space. Please check your settings.
